failureThreshold.description: The number of consecutive health checks. Maximum value of 10.

resourcePath.description: The path that you want Route 53 to request when performing health checks. Route 53 automatically adds the DNS name for the service. If you don't specify a value, the default value is /.

type.description: The type of health check that you want to create, which indicates how Route 53 determines whether an endpoint is healthy. Valid Values: HTTP, HTTPS, TCP
